So far, you have learnt to ask a RQ, design a study, collect the data, and classify the data.
**In this chapter**, you will learn to summarise *qualitative* data.
You will learn to:

* summarise qualitative data using the appropriate graphs.
* summarise qualitative data using, for example, medians and odds to summarise qualitative data.
